title: Dazzling Diamond Peacock Haaram Set with Matching Earrings
materials: Cultured Pearls. Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features intricate peacock motifs, a symbol of beauty and prosperity in Telugu tradition. The design incorporates delicate filigree work and is studded with sparkling diamonds. Emeralds and Rubies accent the piece, adding a touch of regal color. The earrings mirror the haaram's design, creating a cohesive and opulent look. The cascading pearls add a traditional 'guttapusalu' (గుట్టపూసలు) effect.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) with accents of green (emeralds)
and gold. The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other significant Telugu and South Indian ceremonies. Also suitable for high-end social events and family celebrations.
description: This Diamond Peacock Haaram set is a true heirloom piece, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry. The superior craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure its durability and lasting beauty. The intricate peacock design symbolizes good fortune and elegance, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. It offers a stunning blend of traditional aesthetics and contemporary appeal.
